<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/registry-svc/echo"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



This endpoint is used to test the server's response to a request.
It simply echoes back the request body as a JSON response.

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Echoed response","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"additionalProperties":true,"type":"object"}}}},"400":{"description":"Invalid JSON","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"additionalProperties":{"type":"string"},"type":"object"}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
